title: 1962년 Unknown 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Unknown. 판결일: 1962-05-21. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Nathan Hausman, in His Own Behalf as a Stockholder of Pantepec Oil Company, C.A., and in Behalf of All Other Such Stockholders Similarly Situated, and Joseph Applebaum, the Applebaum Foundation, Inc., Alfred N. Barnett, Julie A. Buckley, as Remaining Trustee U/w of Daniel Buckley, Deceased, Peter Fundaro, Harold Maltz, Norvin H. Rieser, Fred Weibert and Regina Weibert and L. H. Luckett, Intervenor-Plaintiffs-Appellants v. John W. Buckley, the Catawba Corporation and Pantepec Oil Company, C.A., and John S. Bailey, Eduardo Lopez De Ceballos, George s.montgomery, Jr., Jose Melich Orsini, Santiago Segovia, John T. Sinclair, Jr., Guy K. Stewart,r. Ramirez U., Cecilio Velasco, G. J. Van Wageningen, Phillips Petroleumcompany

**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit

## 인용

    United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit.
    Argued Jan. 3, 1962.Decided Feb. 13, 1962, Certiorari Denied May 21, 1962, See82 S.Ct. 1157.
    
      Robert B. Block, New York City, of counsel (Heffner, Block & Block, Sonnenschein & Sherman, Murray W. Greif, New York City), for appellants.
      Thomas W. Hill, Jr., New York City (Spear & Hill, New York City), for John W. Buckley and The Catawba Corporation.
